verbs.description: [V: summarize] [ARG1: the role of importance of ethical leadership small - business owners are the moral and ethical leaders of their organizations] they are responsible for the behavior of their employees both individually and as a whole as ethical leaders they create the codes of conduct that shape their organization actions which include everything from workplace behavior ethical leadership leadership
